title: 想从零基础开始学怎么看服务器报错
author: z1043512027
txt_content:
如题，想学具体怎么看报错
顺带问题，我的世界的JAVA编程要怎么学

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
z1043512027 发表于 2017-2-2 23:11
哪部分是具体错误[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]: java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.java:339)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.java:200)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.java:182)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:392)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:579)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:528)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(NetworkClient.java:180)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:432)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(HttpClient.java:527)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.<init>(HttpClient.java:211)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(HttpClient.java:308)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(HttpClient.java:326)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(HttpURLConnection.java:997)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(HttpURLConnection.java:933)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(HttpURLConnection.java:851)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(HttpURLConnection.java:1301)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at java.net.URL.openStream(URL.java:1037)
[20:38:59] [Forge Version Check/WARN]:         at net.minecraftforge.common.ForgeVersion$1.run(ForgeVersion.java:90)复制代码
已知在第一个插件加载前出现这些抛出
已知服务端有自动更新操作并且更新服务器在国外
并从第一句错误得出原因是"服务端更新连接外网超时"
所以说基本上都是看第一句
at后面是调用的某某类某某行代码出错，一般是给插件作者看的

replies.author: CraftTime
replies.txt_content: 想看保存请先学习java到中阶水平，建议看一本书系统学习

replies.author: CraftTime
replies.txt_content:
z1043512027 发表于 2017-2-2 12:50
看什么书
只要是java入门一类的书都可以，学完后看懂常见的报错没问题的

replies.author: z1043512027
replies.txt_content:
CraftTime 发表于 2017-2-2 12:00
想看保存请先学习java到中阶水平，建议看一本书系统学习
看什么书

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
只是看报错的话，会英语就够了，java基础
因为很多插件会抛出具体错误

replies.txt_content:
